resources.string:
"App created by TrianguloY. This app is not affiliated with WhatsApp Inc.
>"Play Store"
>"App page"
Acknowledgements: Thanks to Timofey Lisunov for providing the ru (Russian) locale translation! Thanks to Matheus Damacs for providing the pt-pt (Portuguese - Portugal) locale translation! Thanks to Yusuf Emen for providing the tr (Turkish) locale translation! Thanks to Benjamin Yılmaz Çetiner for providing the de (German) locale translation! Thanks to Richard Anderson (Hirai RCD) for providing the pt-br (Portuguese - Brazil) locale translation!
You can change the app language by clicking the button below (the app will be restarted)."

"This app uses WhatsApp public api to open a chat with any number you enter. No contact is created on the device. More info "here".
Insert the number and the "prefix" with no extra characters, only numbers 0–9. You can click on the \'+\' item to choose from a list. Example: for +44 (UK) 123 456 7890 write 44 1234567890"
" Use this to create a link that will open WhatsApp when clicked. You can specify a number and/or a message that will be placed on the input box (will NOT, I repeat, will NOT send the message)."

string.name: txt_donation
string.comment: This string will only be visible on english and spanish translations

resources.string: For those who asked: you can give me a small donation here (~1€)
With this addon you can allow this app to show a list of unknown recent calls to click. Don\'t worry: it\'s free, smaller than a picture, and no ads.
Message that will be autocompleted, NOT sent.
Couldn\'t open WhatsApp. Is it installed?
Do you want to remove all recents?
Do you want to open the FAQ (Frequently asked questions) page? External browser will be opened.
No unknown numbers found or couldn\'t be read
This will show the list of unknowns recent calls. Permission to view the calls and to access contacts (to remove known numbers) are needed.
